author: cstamas
msg: MINDEXER-14: ensuring indexer returns all hits found. This change makes Indexer OOM prone!

author: cstamas
msg: MINDEXER-18: Adding animal-sniffer to ensure Java 1.5 compatibility. See MINDEXER-18 for more.

author: cstamas
msg: * HitLimit as "feature" dropped. API calls in place but deprecated and return always "not-hit-limited" values.
* To limit result set size, use Count. Works on IteratorSearch and FlatSearch, but not on GroupedSearch (TODO)
* smaller fixes regarding API deprecation and better method namings
